articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: A male mastodon suffered a brutal injury before he died 13,200 years ago - CNN
articles.description: A male mastodon died after a nasty fight with a rival about 13,200 years ago in what is now northeast Indiana. His tusks reveal how the 8-ton adult died and where he trekked across North America.
articles.content: (CNN)A male mastodon died fighting with a rival during mating season about 13,200 years ago in what is now northeast Indiana. Now, his well-preserved fossil and tusks reveal not only how the 8-ton ad… [+3862 chars]
